title: Want my Pixel 3a XL screen fixed, how can I get in touch with google customer service?
content: I broke the screen on my phone and can't use the inbuilt customer service from the Pixel. IMEI-code in the "find an authorized repair partner" on google, it says I have to contact support. When I click on the link I just get to a menu, with no contact info. And when I finally found the same option to get a call or text from google online, I get the error "contact us on business hours". Which is weird because I'm trying in "business hours". Please help
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3a XL
